raw_body: REV. SISTER MARIE PHYLLIS RODRIGO expired. Her mortal remains laid to rest at St. Agnes’ Convent,​ Bolawalana,​ Negombo on Wednesday 1st November and thereafter will be taken to Good Shepherd Convent,​ Nayakakanda on Thursday 2nd November at 9.00 a.m. The Eucharistic Celebration will be at 2.30 p.m. followed by burial.070401
